interestingcomments.content: Just for information. I hardly use this App but I when I open the App on my iPad I get a warning that this App will no longer be compatible with iOS 11 and it may slow down the working of the iPad running iOS 10. I hope Leica will release an update for it. At least I will be able to use it on my older iPhone with iOS 9. Best

interestingcomments.content: I'm an android user still waiting on an android app for the M... I can't figure out why they wouldn't have one comprehensive for all their cameras, instead of individual apps for each camera. Anyone know when they might release an android M app? Leica is not in the software business. If they had an all-in-one app for their cameras it would be priced out-of-reach. Consider updates, mandates. So individuals or contractors limit the scope of their product to limit liability. Finally consider the small market for Leica software - hardly attractive to a developer. Edited August 19, 2017 by pico
